name: Scan 4 Satan!
description:
When life gives you lemons,

Release your inner demons!

In this whimsical, satanic pixel graphics game you scan the packages and make time pass - but don't get caught by your boss. Press S to scan, press M to change modes. Enjoy!

Created by Camilla, Nicolai, Kristian and Juliane at Nordic Game Jam 2023.

Color palette based on Wildeoknights swatches. Find them here! https://wildleoknight.itch.io/super-game-boy-palettes
